description: This file defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) class 'FundTransferRequest' used to encapsulate details of a fund transfer request in a financial application.

classes.name: FundTransferRequest
classes.description: A DTO class representing a fund transfer request with fields for source account, destination account, amount, and authentication ID.

methods.name: getter and setter methods generated by Lombok @Data annotation
methods.description: Automatically generated getter and setter methods for all fields to access and modify their values.
